# AgeRangeService.Response.declinedSharing

**Case**

Indicates the person declined to share their age range with your app.

## Declaration

```swift
case declinedSharing
```

## Getting the age range response

- **AgeRangeService.Response.sharing(range:)**: Contains the person’s shared age range information.

items.description: Contains the person’s shared age range information.
items.name: AgeRangeService.Response.sharing(range:)

title: AgeRangeService.Response.declinedSharing
